testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Guest wants to enroll in a class As a guest in www.cloudcodecampus.com I want to enroll in a class so I can submit my excellent solution to one of its projects
--Output from Guests first view-- Scenario: Guests first view # GuestWantsToSubmitCode.feature:6 Given Im a guest When I enter the home page Then I should see a list with public projects and on click, its submitions
--Output from Guest found interesting project-- Scenario: Guest found interesting project # GuestWantsToSubmitCode.feature:11 Given Im on a project page When I click on "Submit solution" Then I should be redirect to User SignUp or Login
